source.af064cac: data.Gender = [1 if each == "Male" else 0 for each in data.Gender]
source.6469d586:
y = data.Gender.values
x_data = data.drop("Gender" , axis =1 )
x = (x_data - np.min(x_data))/(np.max(x_data) - np.min(x_data)).values
source.1ac0787c: x_train , x_test , y_train , y_test = train_test_split(x,y,test_size = 0.2 , random_state = 42)
source.454247d3:
score_list = []
for each in range(20,30):
    knn2 = KNeighborsClassifier(n_neighbors = each)
    knn2.fit(x_train , y_train)
    score_list.append(knn2.score(x_test,y_test))
    
plt.plot(range(20,30),score_list)
plt.xlabel("K Values")
plt.ylabel("Accuracy")
plt.show()
source.e370c359:
knn = KNeighborsClassifier(n_neighbors = 20)
knn.fit(x_train , y_train)
pred = knn.predict(x_test)
print("{} nn skoru {}".format(20,knn.score(x_test,y_test)))
